data.title: Asian-Latin Fusion on a Food Truck
data.text:
Bumped into this food truck on Daniel Island one time; food looked and smelled amazing, but I had already eaten, so I forced myself not to be a glutton and I passed on a purchase.  Fast forward a few months and while at a Healing Arts fair in the West Ashley area, the organizers brought in this food truck as a healthy gastronomic option for attendees at the fair.

My wife and I hungry for some food this time jumped at the opportunity to eat there versus a sit-down diner somewhere.  Sharon had the Pad Thai with fresh local veggies.  I opted for the quesadilla special stuffed with all kinda goodness.  Both of us opted for the ginger-lemonade.

All in All a very satisfying dining experience and our gal at the window was quite friendly and all in the truck on this fairly hot day were pleasant despite the high temperatures.

Latin-Asian Fusion... well that is a new one on me, should they open up a brick-and-mortar shop, count me as 1st in line to dine.
